Improvements.Improvement: Use StringUtils.isEmpty() to check for empty string
Improvements.Description: Instead of comparing with ATTRIBUTE_NOT_DEFINED to check if the href attribute is not defined, it would be better to use StringUtils.isEmpty() which checks both null and empty string and is more readable.

Improvements.Improvement: Avoid string concatenation within a loop
Improvements.Description: String concatenation within a loop can affect the performance. In this case, StringBuilder is more efficient

Improvements.Improvement: Use ternary operator instead of if-else statement
Improvements.Description: Since only the target variable is set in the if-else statement, it is much simpler and more readable to use a ternary operator instead.
